synopsis.text:
World s collide as Meiko Mochizuki's beloved Digimon partner, Meicoomon, undergoes a dark evolution into Meicrackmon, succumbing to a malevolent influence. As Meicrackmon vanishes to spread chaos, the Digital World turns against Meiko and the other Chosen Children, forcing them to evade enemies and seek a way home. Meanwhile, a representative from the enigmatic Homeostasis reveals Meicoomon's origins to Meiko's father and Daigo Nishijima of the Incorporated Administrative Agency, proposing to eradicate the digital monster to prevent further incursions into the human world.

In the fifth installment of the Digimon Adventure series, Meicoomon's uncontrollable power threatens the very fabric of reality. After witnessing Meiko's injury at the hands of a mysterious figure, Meicoomon's despair pushes her into the distorted human realm, where she becomes a harbinger of destruction. As the countdown to annihilation begins, powerful Digimon like Omegamon, Jesmon, and Alphamon prepare to confront Meicoomon, leaving Meiko to grapple with the guilt that her partner may be a being that should never have existed.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
